body: You can wait for XQ to return in a week or so - and he'll probably say that we shouldn't add these.  I'm perfectly OK with scatter_nd and gather_nd getting GPU kernels for int32/int64, but not scatter/gather.
body_html: You can wait for XQ to return in a week or so - and he'll probably say that we shouldn't add these. I'm perfectly OK with scatter_nd and gather_nd getting GPU kernels for int32/int64, but not scatter/gather.
